code: import React from'react';import FlatList from"react-native-web/dist/exports/FlatList";import Text from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Text";import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";import shortid from'shortid';var ageLimit=90;var getRandomAge=function getRandomAge(maxAge){return Math.floor(Math.random()*Math.floor(maxAge))+1;};var randomColor=function randomColor(){return'#'+Math.floor(Math.random()*16777215).toString(16);};var data=[{name:'Friend 1',age:getRandomAge(ageLimit),id:shortid.generate()},{name:'Friend 2',age:getRandomAge(ageLimit),id:shortid.generate()},{name:'Friend 3',age:getRandomAge(ageLimit),id:shortid.generate()},{name:'Friend 4',age:getRandomAge(ageLimit),id:shortid.generate()},{name:'Friend 5',age:getRandomAge(ageLimit),id:shortid.generate()}];var ListScreen=function ListScreen(){return React.createElement(FlatList,{data:data,keyExtractor:function keyExtractor(friend){return friend.id;},renderItem:function renderItem(_ref){var item=_ref.item;return React.createElement(Text,{style:{backgroundColor:randomColor(),margin:5}}," ",item.name," - Age ",item.age);}});};export default ListScreen;
